h2. Support

Please use the form below or mail to [support@cloudscalers.com|mailto:support@cloudscalers.com]

{{div3: class=support | ng-app=myApp | ng-controller=SupportController}}
{{ contact_form: receiver_email:support@cloudscalers.com | custom | subject: CloudScalers.com support}}
    {{html: <!-- Angular doesn't bind hidden input. This is a workaround to make it work -->}}
    {{html: <input type="hidden" style="display: none" name="sender_name" value="{[currentUser.username]}">}}
    {{html: <input type="hidden" style="display: none" name="sender_email" value="{[currentUser.username + '@cloudscalers.com']}">}}

    {{div: class=control-group}}
        {{html: <label class="control-label" for="topic">Topic</label>}}
        {{div2: class=controls}}
            {{ text: name=topic | required=true | class=input-large}}
        {{div2}}
    {{div}}

    {{div: class=control-group}}
        {{html: <label class="control-label" for="body">Description</label>}}
        {{div2: class=controls}}
            {{ textarea: name=body | required=true }}
        {{div2}}
    {{div}}

    {{div: class=form-actions}}
        {{ submit: class=btn btn-info btn-large | data-loading-text=Sending... }}
            {{html: Send to Support}}
        {{submit}}
    {{div}}

{{ contact_form }}
{{div3}}
{{html:
    <script src="/$$space/.files/js/controllers/support.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
}}
